narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
 
This 1st pre-license inspection for a class "A" license and exit briefing were conducted with the applicant.
No regulated activities can occur until you have been issued your USDA license.
The license fee in the amount of $225 must be mailed to the following address:
USDA-APHIS-Animal Care
2150 Centre Ave., Bldg B, Mail Stop 3W11
Ft. Collins, CO 80526
